entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy south of Plum Point with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy except cloudy south of Plum Point with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
